cards.title: The Fury
powers: {TheFuryCharacter} regains 2 HP and is indestructible this turn. She deals herself 0 psychic damage, then deals 1 target X melee damage and increases the next damage dealt to {TheFuryCharacter} by X, where X = 1 plus the damage she takes this way.
incapacitatedAbilities: Put the top card of a deck into play. Cards from that deck cannot be played until the start of your next turn.
Select a target. Increase the next damage dealt to that target by 2.

openingLines.default: Your [b]iniquities[/b] echo in the deep, screaming for [b]retribution[/b]!
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: With your appearance unappointed, these are not your threads to cut.

cards.title: Abyssal Gaze
body: When this card would be revealed or enter your hand, put it into play.
Damage dealt by {TheFuryCharacter} is irreducible.

At the start of your turn, select up to 3 targets other than {TheFuryCharacter}. Increase the next damage dealt to each of the selected targets by 1. If none of the selected targets are hero character cards, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: The Fury's justice is{BR}more like vengeance, Ms. Leroux. No{BR}one's hands are fully clean. To her, a{BR}just Bastion is an empty Bastion.

cards.title: Allotted Time
body: When a target would be dealt damage, you may make that target indestructible this turn. Resolve that damage normally, then that target regains X HP and destroys this card, where X = 1 plus the damage dealt this way.

flavorQuotes.text: The other bullet? Glanced{BR}off the shell casing of the first.{BR}Should have gone through your heart.{BR}Even a lucky man would be dead.

cards.title: Balancing the Scales
body: {TheFuryCharacter} deals 1 target 3 infernal damage.
A second target regains 3 HP.
Increase the next damage dealt to a third target by 3.

flavorQuotes.text: Noble Erinye, my evils are many, and{BR}I accept whatever punishment you deem just! Yet, while I submit for judgment,{BR}a greater evil goes unpunished!

cards.flavorReference: Aniela, Grim Tidings: A Woman Scorned

cards.title: Broken Bonds
body: Increase damage dealt to and by {TheFuryCharacter} by 1.
When this card is destroyed, you may play a card or use a power.
At the start of your turn, you may destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Wretched golem, I have counted{BR}your betrayals! The world groans{BR}beneath their weight!

cards.title: Crafting the Future
body: Reveal and replace the top card of a deck.
Put the top card of a deck into play.
Draw a card.
You may play a card or use a power.

flavorQuotes.text: Do you have to hurt{BR}people? Is that all justice is to you?
Enough prattle! Behold the{BR}splendors of fortune, the true{BR}inheritance of the just!

cards.title: Dark Justice
body: When {TheFuryCharacter} deals herself damage, select a target. Increase the next damage dealt to that target by 1.

When a source other than {TheFuryCharacter} deals {TheFuryCharacter} damage, you may increase the next damage dealt to {TheFuryCharacter} and the source of that damage by 1 for every 2 points of damage dealt this way.

flavorQuotes.text: Cease your worthless groveling.{BR}Your punishments are sufficient. Your{BR}petition has been answered; the matter closed. Do not call on me again.

cards.flavorReference: The Fury, Grim Tidings: A Woman Scorned

cards.title: Destroyer's Dirge
body: Increase damage dealt by {TheFuryCharacter} by 1 for each Coincidence in your trash.
powers: {TheFuryCharacter} is indestructible this turn. She deals herself 1 psychic damage, then deals 1 target X irreducible melee damage that cannot be redirected and increases the next damage dealt to {TheFuryCharacter} by X, where X = 2 plus the damage she takes this way.

flavorQuotes.text: Your iniquities cast{BR}shadows deep into the bowels of{BR}Bastion! I can see beneath your false{BR}face. So shall your compatriots!

cards.title: Fortean Foe
body: When this card enters play, search your deck and trash for any number of Coincidences and put them into your hand. If you searched your deck, shuffle it. You may play any number of Coincidences.
Coincidences are indestructible.
At the start of your turn, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: {click}

cards.title: Improbable Impediment
body: If this card is destroyed, put it in your hand.
The first time {TheFuryCharacter} is dealt damage on the turn this card enters play, you may play a card. If it is a Coincidence, repeat this text.

When {TheFuryCharacter} would be dealt damage by another source, you may prevent it. If you do, increase the next damage dealt to her by X, where X = 1 plus the amount that damage was increased by, and discard or destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Sniper{BR}rounds were intercepted by a safe{BR}falling from a third-floor window. Who{BR}were they after?
Liana Leroux. We need to move!

cards.title: Infernal Twin
body: When a One-Shot enters play, you may destroy this card. If you do, resolve the text of that One-Shot a second time, then the character from that card's deck with the lowest HP deals itself 2 irreducible infernal damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Sisters three, take{BR}unto ye the gem of mine own heart.{BR}Grant to me the majesty to show your sacred{BR}sign! Now decree through land and sea for that{BR}once torn apart: threnodies abandoned be, this{BR}wounded world aligned.

cards.title: Measurer's Meter
powers: Select up to 3 targets. Increase or reduce the next damage dealt to each selected target by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: You think the Fates didn't know{BR}he was cheating them? This power is{BR}meant for [b]you,[/b] Liana.

cards.flavorReference: Glyph, A Crack in the Firmament One-Shot

cards.title: Quibble
body: Once during a turn, when {TheFuryCharacter} would deal or be dealt damage, you may first put a non-character card in play on top of its deck. If you do, you may play a card or use a power.
At the end of each turn, if you have put a card on top of a deck in this way, put the top card of that deck into play and destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.oldtext: Victim is Dakken. Real name unknown.{BR}Apparently he believed some sort{BR}of prophecy. According to bystanders, his{BR}last words were 'No man can defeat me.'
flavorQuotes.text: Victim's Dakken. Believed in some sort of{BR}prophecy. Bystanders say his last{BR}words were 'No man can defeat me.'

cards.title: Ruinous Rampage
body: When this card is revealed, play it.
{TheFuryCharacter} deals herself 0 psychic damage.

She then deals 1 target that has not been dealt melee damage this way this turn X melee damage, where X = 2 plus the psychic damage dealt this way minus the number of times melee damage was dealt this way this turn. If melee damage is dealt this way, {TheFuryCharacter} regains 1 HP, then repeat this text.

flavorQuotes.text: Now your{BR}secret power is unveiled!
No! You see her--
--she sees you!

cards.title: Unturning Emissary
body: {TheFuryCharacter} is indestructible.
When {TheFuryCharacter} is dealt damage, discard a card or destroy this card. Then increase the next damage dealt to {TheFuryCharacter} by 1.
At the end of your turn, if {TheFuryCharacter} has 1 or more HP, you may draw a card. If you did not play a card this turn, discard a card.

flavorQuotes.text: Vile treachers, your evils{BR}echo beyond the heavens! I bring{BR}you a message from behind the veil!

cards.flavorReference: The Fury, Guardians at the Gate #99

cards.title: Vicious Onslaught
body: {TheFuryCharacter} deals 1 target 3 irreducible melee damage, 3 targets 2 irreducible melee damage each, or 7 targets 1 irreducible melee damage each.
If a hero target is dealt damage this way, you may play a card, use a power, or discard a card. If you discard a card, return this card to your hand.

flavorQuotes.text: I'm... sorry. The Fury{BR}doesn't see the way we do.
[b]You're[/b] the Fury.
Not exactly. It's complicated.

cards.title: Weaver's Words
powers: Reduce the next damage dealt to {TheFuryCharacter} by 7. Play the top card of the villain deck.
Shuffle a trash. If the top card of that trash is not a One-Shot, play it.

flavorQuotes.text: You have failed to provide her the{BR}destiny she was promised, Brother Leroux.{BR}She is beginning to write her own fate.

cards.flavorReference: Brother Stevens, Funeral for a Fiend

cards.title: Weird Luck
body: When an effect would increase the next damage dealt to {TheFuryCharacter}, select a target other than {TheFuryCharacter}. Increase the next damage dealt to that target by 1 or increase the next damage dealt by that target by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: You're pushing{BR}your luck.
